containerClasses: content-section mb-16 bg-gradient-to-b from-white to-gray-50 rounded-xl p-6 md:p-10 shadow-md border border-gray-100 relative overflow-hidden min-h-[300px]

icon.containerClasses: inline-flex items-center justify-center w-14 h-14 rounded-full bg-[#0066FF] text-white mb-4 shadow-lg shadow-[#0066FF]/20 gallery-icon

divider.classes: w-24 h-1 bg-gradient-to-r from-[#0066FF] to-[#5045E8] rounded-full mx-auto mb-6 gallery-divider

description.text: Browse through images from our previous events to get a glimpse of what to expect. Our events are designed to foster collaboration, innovation, and learning in a dynamic environment.

filters.containerClasses: flex flex-wrap justify-center gap-2 md:gap-3 mb-10 gallery-filters

button.baseClasses: px-4 py-2 md:px-5 md:py-2.5 rounded-full text-sm font-medium transition-all duration-300 transform hover:-translate-y-0.5 gallery-filter-btn
button.inactiveClasses: bg-white text-gray-700 border border-gray-200 hover:border-[#0066FF]/30 hover:text-[#0066FF]

grid.containerClasses: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6 md:gap-8 gallery-grid

item.containerClasses: relative group cursor-pointer rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 transform hover:-translate-y-1 gallery-item

overlay.classes: absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/70 via-black/30 to-transparent opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-300 flex flex-col justify-end p-5

category.containerClasses: absolute top-3 left-3 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold text-white shadow-sm gallery-category

title.classes: text-white text-lg font-bold mb-2 transform translate-y-4 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 group-hover:translate-y-0 transition-all duration-300 gallery-item-title

description.classes: text-white/90 text-sm transform translate-y-4 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 group-hover:translate-y-0 transition-all duration-300 delay-75 gallery-item-description

lightbox.containerClasses: fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-black/95 p-4

closeButton.containerClasses: absolute top-6 right-6 w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-black/60 flex items-center justify-center text-white hover:bg-black/80 transition-all duration-300 z-10 hover:scale-110

category.containerClasses: inline-block px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-semibold text-white shadow-sm mb-2
